Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackgroundL, ConveyorL, InserterL, MaterialL, PersonL, Place

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    General class for entities of the game
